archimate:Principle.name: Decentralization by Design
archimate:Principle.documentation: A set of principles developed by the Sovrin Foundation to build decentralization into systems from the very start. The Decentralization by Design principles are a subset of the Sovrin Core Principles.

properties.value: (c) 2019 by Sovrin Foundation. This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution- ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
